abstract: After problems with iPhone alarms to start the new year, Apple said the error would be fixed by Monday.
snippet: After problems with iPhone alarms to start the new year, Apple said the error would be fixed by Monday.
lead_paragraph: Pat Kiernan, a morning anchor on NY1, the New York City cable news channel, is no stranger to alarm clock problems. That’s why he usually relies on several clocks, phones and other devices to wake him in time for his early newscasts.

headline.main: Bug Causes iPhone Alarm to Greet New Year With Silence
headline.print_headline: Bug Causes iPhone Alarm to Greet New Year With Silence
